sub_title: Consultant - Business Solutions @ Zone24x7 | ITIL, Business Analysis
summary:
As a Consultant-Business Solutions at Zone24x7, I leverage my 10+ years of experience in business analysis, my MBCS credential from the British Computer Society, and my certifications in ITIL Foundation and Professional Graduate Diploma in Higher Education Qualification to lead and guide multiple business solutions for clients across various industries. 

I apply my skills in BPMN and UML diagramming, pre-sales system presentations, competitor and market analysis, and technical feasibility assessment to create innovative and impactful solutions that align with organisational goals and meet client expectations. I collaborate with company discipline heads, technical teams, and cross-functional teams to ensure the quality and efficiency of the solution delivery. I am passionate about finding new ways to solve complex problems and deliver value to the customers and the company.

projects.title: Zone24x7 RFID Middleware Solution
projects.description: Zone24x7 RFID Middleware Solution Is a convergent solution to make the RFID hardware and Business applications connect. Acts as the data retriever from the hardware , collect, validate, filter, sort and process data and send to the client enterprise solutions via API. This solution takes out the confusing hardware configurations to quick and easy set-up of RFID devices to make use of the technology while monitoring the health of the device and connections.

Head of Business Solutions at Zone24x7

projects.title: Energy Systems Project Platform
projects.description:
It is a customer facing web platform which collects and initiates projects on designing and implementing energy solutions to exiting or new buildings. These projects are mainly for smart home energy solution which requires lot of information and requirements to be gathered via this web platform without giving a hard time to the customer. 
User experience was a key factor that the client was expecting from this new web platform introduction. It also expected to increase customer conversion with direct data collection. The web portal also carries content on Smart Energy products and services that the client offer as well as a well designed blog with the successful projects completed and general energy related information useful the customers. 
The customers  or vendors who are interested to initiate a Smart energy projects can create and manage their own profile while referring to all the documentations and instructions shared by the company via the portal.
The web portal administrative backend supported to manage content, manage customer profiles and manage projects with document uploads and information sharing. The portal was integrated with google analytics and maintained documentation with a SharePoint integrations.

projects.title: Zone24x7 Cross border Delivery Management solution
projects.description: Zone24x7 Cross border Delivery Management solution Is a parcel tracking solution for overseas customers to use a cross border delivery service as the middle person to receive, verify goods quality and ship across borders to the end customer delivery address. The solution comprise with a customer facing hybrid application with a mobile app and a responsive web application. The backend operations are also supported with a web based admin portal supporting multiple warehouses and in multiple operating languages.

projects.title: Qatar Airways CRM
projects.description: Qatar Airways CRM is a inhouse built CRM solution on customer profiling based on event log analysis of all the transactions in Qatar airways solutions from Loyalty membership to ticketing, airport purchases, in-flight transactions, transit tours , customer service engagements and direct customer feedback. It's a comprehensive data model supported with an ML tool to generate reporting for marketing and organizational decisions.

projects.title: CSG SingleView M2M Rating and Billing system
projects.description: SingleView is a cloud-based billing and provisioning software designed to help businesses handle customer information and streamline convergent charging on a centralised platform. SingleView Convergent Rating & Billing provides flexible, scalable and robust rating, discounting and billing. Revenue can be generated from any kind of service, based on subscription or pricing model as required.

projects.title: Guru Smart School - Learning Management System
projects.description: Is a mass scale elearning ecosystem which allows users to create, manage and sell their own content as an elearning course available for Sri lankan user base. The platform operates in mobile, web based and as desktop solutions where content can be streamed to subscribers free or on a price  with Microsoft Office 365 product integrations. This was a creation focused with requirements of Microsoft Sri Lanka and Education Ministry of Sri Lanka. With the success gained by the first pilot run, now the system is ready to be deployed in 15 more schools around Sri Lanka.

projects.title: Headstart Learning Management System
projects.description: Headstart LMS is a comprehensive full fledged elearning management system that aims to provide best possible learning experience to users. Catering to audiences in Banking, eLearning, Financial Services, Higher Education and Insurance domains on learning operations such as Academic Learning, Channel Training, Employee Training, Franchise/Dealer Training, Workforce Development.One of the most advanced, user friendly and interactive Learning Management system in the ELEarning industry of Sri Lanka. Upgraded with user experience and expertise in the industry more than 8 years. The solution is a package of four core modules Such as User Management, Course Management, Content Management and Other tools. It also comprise with sophisticated e-learning concepts such as gamification, adaptive learning and virtual reality that make the learning more interactive and interesting.

projects.title: Avabill - Telecommunication BSS/OSS suite
projects.description: A comprehensive suite of Business and Operational Support Systems for Telecom Service Providers. The suite is led by a Convergent Customer Care and Billing System for services such as Fixed Line, Mobile Networks (GSM, ETACS, AMPS, etc.), Wireless Local Loop Networks (WILL), Cable TV, Internet and Data Services.

profile_positions.description:
Provide leadership to the multiple business solutions.
Understand the business processes of the client, apply BPR (if needed) and propose the most suitable business solution to the client by using Zone24x7 existing technology platforms.
Closely work with company discipline heads to derive the effort estimation to the proposed business solution.
Prepare business solution presentation and walkthrough with the client and make sure client expectation is properly covered with BPMN and UML Diagramming.
Closely work with the technical teams to ensure the technical feasibility of the proposed business solution.
Perform competitor and market analysis and benchmarking to understand the client’s business domain and needs.
Take corrective action during disputes/crises, resolve conflicts among associates while adapting to the environments.
Be vigilant about potential opportunities and take proactive actions to secure them.
Prepare projects SOWs, proposals, RFP/RFI responses, presentations, etc.
Closely monitor whether the projects are delivering the right expectation to the client.
Help to define the future roadmap of the projects/program/portfolio.
profile_positions.title: Consultant - Business Solutions

profile_positions.description: Was deployed on-site as Business Analyst Consultant for Qatar Airways. I have been involved in the Customer Data Platform and related product.
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Was the Business Analyst in the Customer Data Platform and related products. The product had integration with all the customer related systems of the airlines which supported for sales, marketing and analytics teams to enable relevant and personalized customer services through all Customer interactive departments,
Had the international exposure on communicating verity of aviation operations teams stakeholder groups and gather business objectives and come up technical solutions to those requirements through the Customer Data Platform.
Technical Business analyst on projects rolled out for service personalization.  
Business Analyst of the in-house CRM solution which had the centralized customer data center of the airline.  
Research and business case developments on passenger reservation, on-boarding and in-flight services adhering to the IATA standards.
Requirement gathering and documentation of User stories and Acceptance criteria.  
Facilitate cross communication between business team and the implementation team  Involvement in Pod and MVP product life cycles.  
Experienced in MS Azure DevOps project management practices and delivery management. 
Facilitate, daily standup, requirement discussion, sprint planning and Sprint retrospective meetings.  
Technical documentation of product specifications, system integrations and research on similar platforms to provide recommendations.
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst Consultant

Billing and Customer services

Addressing credit Management requests and performing issue analysis related to the Billing System Facilitate cross communication between business team and the implementation team.

Conducted training, mentoring and peer Raising new client requirements to the Management teams with compared to the existing system functionalities. 
Achievement: Received “Top Talent” awards for two consecutive years from annual Virtusa Performance evaluation
